text: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا
translation: (5) And indeed, I fear the successors[808] after me, and my wife has been barren, so give me from Yourself an heir
footnotes: [808]- Those relatives from the father's side who would inherit religious authority.
